Detailed Description

Simple linked list of Chain objects.

Unlike other implementations of linked lists tail is not pointing to the last item of the list but to the next pointer of the last item or as long as the list is empty to the head of the list. This saves the verification for existing items if an item is queued. If however an item is removed this verification has to be done.

Default constructor

Intializes tghe queue to be empty, sets head to NULL and tail to point to head
